mapper.update: update ppm_product set product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_desc = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ppm_product_id = #{ppmProductId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select product_id, product_code, product_name, product_desc, start_time, end_time, product_type, status, ppm_product_id from ppm_product where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select product_id, product_code, product_name, product_desc, start_time, end_time, product_type, status, ppm_product_id from ppm_product

select product_id, product_code, product_name, product_desc, start_time, end_time, product_type, status, ppm_product_id from ppm_product where 1=1
and product_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{productName}),'%')
mapper.insert:

status,

mapper.update:
update ppm_product
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_desc = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ppm_product_id = #{ppmProductId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select product_id, product_code, product_name, product_desc, start_time, end_time, product_type, status, ppm_product_id from ppm_product where product_code = #{code}
